Merge two images according to a mask. Result R is R = A*m+B*(m-1) . TODO: Fix C-code of masked_merge to accept D8 input for the mask

maximalCoveringCircle :: (Fractional t2, Num t1, Num t) => Image c d -> (CInt, CInt, CDouble) -> (t, t1, t2)

Given a distance map and a circle, return the biggest circle with radius less than given in the distance map that fully covers the previous one
